Segment.name: FST
Segment.comment: To specify the forecasted dates and quantities

Field.name: ForecastQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the sender's confidence level of the forecast data or an action associated with a forecast

Field.name: TimingQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying interval grouping of the forecast or product activity

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Time
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: PlanningScheduleTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of planning schedule used

Field.name: QuantityQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of quantity

Field.name: AdjustmentReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating reason for debit or credit memo or adjustment to invoice, debit or credit memo, or payment

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

SyntaxNote.name: P0607
SyntaxNote.comment: If either FST06 or FST07 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0809
SyntaxNote.comment: If either FST08 or FST09 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1312
SyntaxNote.comment: If FST13 is present, then FST12 is required.
